events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: t: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: t: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: t: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: t: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: t: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: t: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: t: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: t: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: Gaza hospital blast and humanitarian concerns
events.wd_label: Gaza hospital blast and humanitarian concerns
events.wd_description: A massive blast at Al-Ahli Hospital in Gaza has killed hundreds, raising humanitarian concerns over Israel's deprivation of food, fuel, and electricity to Gaza's population.
events.description: A massive blast at Al-Ahli Hospital in Gaza has killed hundreds, raising humanitarian concerns over Israel's deprivation of food, fuel, and electricity to Gaza's population.

events.name: Hospital blast
events.wd_description: Al-Ahli Hospital, sheltering thousands of displaced people, was bombed, resulting in hundreds of casualties and many still trapped under rubble.
events.description: Al-Ahli Hospital, sheltering thousands of displaced people, was bombed, resulting in hundreds of casualties and many still trapped under rubble.

events.name: Humanitarian concerns
events.wd_description: Humanitarian concerns mount over Israel's deprivation of food, fuel, and electricity to Gaza's population.
events.description: Humanitarian concerns mount over Israel's deprivation of food, fuel, and electricity to Gaza's population.

events.name: Siege of Gaza
events.wd_description: Israel has laid siege to Gaza for over a week in response to a deadly incursion by Hamas.
events.description: Israel has laid siege to Gaza for over a week in response to a deadly incursion by Hamas.

events.name: Unprecedented heatwave in Brazil in November 2023
events.wd_label: Unprecedented heatwave in Brazil in November 2023
events.wd_description: An unusual heatwave in Brazil has affected nearly 3,000 towns and over a hundred million people, with record temperatures recorded in major cities like Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo.
events.description: An unusual heatwave in Brazil has affected nearly 3,000 towns and over a hundred million people, with record temperatures recorded in major cities like Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo.

events.name: El Niño and climate change impact
events.wd_label: El Niño and climate change impact
events.wd_description: The heatwave is attributed to the El Niño phenomenon and climate change, which have increased the frequency and duration of extreme weather events in Brazil.
events.description: The heatwave is attributed to the El Niño phenomenon and climate change, which have increased the frequency and duration of extreme weather events in Brazil.

events.name: Record temperatures in Brazilian cities
events.wd_description: Rio de Janeiro recorded a November high of 42.5°C, with humidity making it feel like 58.5°C, while Sao Paulo saw average temperatures of 37.3°C during the heatwave.
events.description: Rio de Janeiro recorded a November high of 42.5°C, with humidity making it feel like 58.5°C, while Sao Paulo saw average temperatures of 37.3°C during the heatwave.

events.name: Increased energy usage
events.wd_description: The heatwave has led to a surge in energy usage across Brazil as residents try to cope with the extreme heat, pushing energy consumption to new highs.
events.description: The heatwave has led to a surge in energy usage across Brazil as residents try to cope with the extreme heat, pushing energy consumption to new highs.

events.name: Cost Reduction Strategies in EV Manufacturing
events.wd_label: Cost Reduction Strategies in EV Manufacturing
events.wd_description: The rise of inexpensive Chinese electric vehicles has pressured legacy automakers to reduce costs and develop affordable EVs more quickly, leading to various strategies from suppliers and manufacturers.
events.description: The rise of inexpensive Chinese electric vehicles has pressured legacy automakers to reduce costs and develop affordable EVs more quickly, leading to various strategies from suppliers and manufacturers.

events.name: Automaker Pressure
events.wd_description: Automakers are focusing on affordable vehicles to compete with Chinese manufacturers, emphasizing the urgency of cost reduction due to fears of slowing demand.
events.description: Automakers are focusing on affordable vehicles to compete with Chinese manufacturers, emphasizing the urgency of cost reduction due to fears of slowing demand.

events.name: t: Renault's Cost Reduction Plan
events.wd_description: Renault plans to reduce costs by 40% for its EVs to achieve price parity with fossil-fuel models.
events.description: Renault plans to reduce costs by 40% for its EVs to achieve price parity with fossil-fuel models.

events.name: t: Stellantis and CATL Partnership
events.wd_description: Stellantis is building a European plant with China's CATL to make cheaper LFP batteries and has introduced the Citroen electric e-C3 SUV.
events.description: Stellantis is building a European plant with China's CATL to make cheaper LFP batteries and has introduced the Citroen electric e-C3 SUV.

events.name: t: Volkswagen and Tesla EV Development
events.wd_label: t: Volkswagen and Tesla EV Development
events.wd_description: Volkswagen and Tesla are developing 25,000-euro EVs to make them more affordable.
events.description: Volkswagen and Tesla are developing 25,000-euro EVs to make them more affordable.

events.name: Supplier Innovations
events.wd_description: Suppliers are developing new technologies and processes to reduce EV costs and improve efficiency, including battery innovations, motor improvements, and production enhancements.
events.description: Suppliers are developing new technologies and processes to reduce EV costs and improve efficiency, including battery innovations, motor improvements, and production enhancements.

events.name: t: OneD Battery Sciences
events.wd_description: OneD adds silicon nanowires to graphite EV battery anode material to boost range, cut charging time, and save costs.
events.description: OneD adds silicon nanowires to graphite EV battery anode material to boost range, cut charging time, and save costs.

events.name: t: Veekim EV Motor
events.wd_description: Veekim has developed an EV motor with ferrite magnets, reducing costs by 20% and decreasing reliance on rare earths.
events.description: Veekim has developed an EV motor with ferrite magnets, reducing costs by 20% and decreasing reliance on rare earths.

events.name: t: NXP Chip Reduction
events.wd_description: NXP is working with automakers to reduce the number of electronic control units in EVs to lower costs.
events.description: NXP is working with automakers to reduce the number of electronic control units in EVs to lower costs.

events.name: t: Siemens Digital Twins
events.wd_description: Siemens has developed software simulation called digital twins to halve the expensive EV development time.
events.description: Siemens has developed software simulation called digital twins to halve the expensive EV development time.

events.name: t: Our Next Energy Battery Packs
events.wd_label: t: Our Next Energy Battery Packs
events.wd_description: Our Next Energy is developing cheaper battery packs using LFP technology, offering extended range and reduced costs.
events.description: Our Next Energy is developing cheaper battery packs using LFP technology, offering extended range and reduced costs.

events.name: t: CelLink Laminate Sheets
events.wd_description: CelLink has developed a laminate sheet to replace wire harnesses, making EV production more efficient and less labor-intensive.
events.description: CelLink has developed a laminate sheet to replace wire harnesses, making EV production more efficient and less labor-intensive.

events.name: t: Addionics Electrode Materials
events.wd_description: Addionics has created porous, 3D copper and aluminum electrode battery materials that reduce material use and costs, while improving charging speed and range.
events.description: Addionics has created porous, 3D copper and aluminum electrode battery materials that reduce material use and costs, while improving charging speed and range.

events.name: Market Reactions
events.wd_description: Market reactions to cost reduction efforts include increased competition from Chinese EVs and investments by U.S. automakers to develop more affordable models.
events.description: Market reactions to cost reduction efforts include increased competition from Chinese EVs and investments by U.S. automakers to develop more affordable models.

events.name: t: BYD's Dolphin Hatchback
events.wd_description: BYD's Dolphin hatchback is priced nearly 30% below the VW ID.3 hatchback, increasing competitive pressure on legacy automakers.
events.description: BYD's Dolphin hatchback is priced nearly 30% below the VW ID.3 hatchback, increasing competitive pressure on legacy automakers.

events.name: t: GM's Bolt EV revamp
events.wd_description: GM is developing a more inexpensive battery pack for its revamped Bolt EV, which will launch in 2025, two years earlier than planned.
events.description: GM is developing a more inexpensive battery pack for its revamped Bolt EV, which will launch in 2025, two years earlier than planned.

events.name: t: Ford's In-Sourcing Strategy
events.wd_description: Ford aims to cut costs through a 50% increase in in-sourcing parts like batteries and inverters.
events.description: Ford aims to cut costs through a 50% increase in in-sourcing parts like batteries and inverters.
